lead_paragraph: England prop Joe Marler has been suspended for two matches and fined 20,000 pounds ($28,310) by World Rugby for calling Wales counterpart Samson Lee a "gypsy boy" during last month's Six Nations match at Twickenham.

headline.print_headline: Marler Gets Two-Game Ban, Fine for 'Gypsy Boy' Comment
headline.main: Marler Gets Two-Game Ban, Fine for 'Gypsy Boy' Comment

snippet: England prop Joe Marler has been suspended for two matches and fined 20,000 pounds ($28,310) by World Rugby for calling Wales counterpart Samson Lee a "gypsy boy" during last month's Six Nations match at Twickenham....
